author: Anita Olliver
content: Little cafe style order at counter, basic inside but serving the most amazing food & so cheap! I had 1 meat & 2 veg with rice, great portion. Chicken curry, potato curry & lentils. Chilli, coriander,onion, mint yoghurt sauce- all there for the taking. Delicious & quick even though super busy we were in & out within 20 mins. A definite hidden gem!
